Activation: Hearty Restoration.name: Activation:  Hearty Restoration
Activation: Hearty Restoration.description:
Activate R command

Frequency once per day

Trigger You reduce a foe to 0 Hit Points with a Strike from the heartripper blade

Effect The heartripper blade draws life from the victim's body and siphons it into you. Choose one of the following effects:

  • Restore [[/r 2d8[healing]]]{2d8 Hit Points}
  • Reduce the value of your @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied} conditions by 1
  • Reduce the stage of one toxin or disease you're suffering by one stage (this can't reduce the stage below stage 1 or cure the affliction).

Activation: Assisted Lift.name: Activation: Assisted Lift
Activation: Assisted Lift.description:
Activate—Assisted Lift D Interact (manipulate)

Effect You lift an object of up to 8 Bulk as though it were weightless. This requires two hands, and if the object is locked or otherwise held in place, you can attempt to Force it Open using Athletics as part of this activation. The object still has its full weight and Bulk for all other purposes-you just ignore that weight. The effect lasts until the end of your next turn.

Activation: Breathe In.name: Activation: Breathe In
Activation: Breathe In.description:
Activate—Breathe In 1 (manipulate)

Effect You draw a breath of air from the bottle. This allows you to breathe even in an airless or toxic environment. Air doesn't escape the mouth of the bottle, so leaving the open bottle in an airless environment doesn't change the environment.

Activation: Douse Fire.name: Activation: Douse Fire
Activation: Douse Fire.description:
Activate 1 Interact

Frequency once per round

Requirements You're taking persistent fire damage

Effect You call upon the ring to put out the flame and its magic attempts to bring the fire under control. This is especially effective assistance against persistent fire damage, so you gain an immediate flat check to remove the persistent fire damage, and the DC typically decreases from 15 to 10.

Activation: Drip Poison.name: Activation: Drip Poison
Activation: Drip Poison.description:
Activate—Drip Poison F (manipulate)

Frequency once per day

Trigger You damage a creature with the serpent dagger

Effect You poison the creature you hit with dagger venom.

Dagger Venom (poison)

Saving Throw @Check[type:fortitude|dc:21]

Maximum Duration 4 rounds.

Stage 1 @Damage[1d8[poison]] damage and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 1}.

Activation: Droskar's Dominance.name: Activation: Droskar's Dominance
Activation: Droskar's Dominance.description:
Activate 2 envision

Frequency once per day

Effect You cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.J7Y7tl0bbdz7TcCc]{Enfeeble} with a spell attack modifier of +10 ([[/r 1d20+10]]{Spell Attack}) and (@Check[type:fortitude|dc:20|traits:necromancy,attack]).

Activation: Echoes of an Eerie Tale.name: Activation: Echoes of an Eerie Tale
Activation: Echoes of an Eerie Tale.description:
Activate 1 command, Interact

Frequency once per day

Effect You invoke a tale from The Whispering Reeds that parallels the situation, environment, or creatures nearby. Eerie mists and indistinct whispers rise in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:20] around you, and clusters of seven perfectly spaced divots manifest in the ground, vegetation, and flesh of creatures in the emanation other than yourself and up to three creatures you designate at the time of activation. Creatures afflicted with these divots suffer from agonizing mental anguish in the form of crippling despair and take @Damage[(4d6)[mental]] damage (@Check[type:will|dc:27|basic:true] save). The mists, whispers, and strange divots fade away at the end of the round, but any creature that takes mental damage from the effect also takes a -1 penalty to saving throws against effects with the emotion trait for 1 minute. 

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e-item-activations.item-activations-effects.Item.3sYi2GQ5h5279DwJ]{Activation Effect: Echoes of an Eerie Tale}
Activation: Echoes of an Eerie Tale.gmNote: You are exposed to the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-item-activations.item-activations-effects.Item.AQeYkFzIp2skEyV5]{Empty Death} each time you use this ability.

Activation: Elven Alacrity.name: Activation: Elven Alacrity
Activation: Elven Alacrity.description:
Activate F envision

Frequency once per hour

Effect Until the end of your turn, you ignore difficult terrain when moving on the ground. If you're wearing a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.MNBnZn0b80Q7yHJM]{Cloak of Elvenkind}, you also gain a +5-foot status bonus to your land Speed until the end of your turn.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-effects.Item.88kqcDmsoAEddzUt]{Effect: Boots of Elvenkind}

Activation: Elven Alacrity (Greater).name: Activation: Elven Alacrity (Greater)
Activation: Elven Alacrity (Greater).description:
Activate F envision

Frequency once per hour

Effect Until the end of your turn, you ignore difficult terrain when moving on the ground. If you're wearing a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.MNBnZn0b80Q7yHJM]{Cloak of Elvenkind}, you also gain a +5-foot status bonus to your land Speed until the end of your turn, and greater boots of elvenkind constantly grant the effects of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.zlnXpME1T2uvn8Lr]{Vanishing Tracks} (DC 30) in forest environments.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-effects.Item.88kqcDmsoAEddzUt]{Effect: Boots of Elvenkind}

Activation: Exit Stage Left.name: Activation: Exit Stage Left
Activation: Exit Stage Left.description:
Activate D Interact

Frequency once per day

Effect You cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.VlNcjmYyu95vOUe8]{Dimension Door}. The space you leave and the one you appear in are filled with puffs of smoke that make anyone within concealed until they leave the smoke or the end of your next turn, at which point the smoke dissipates. Strong winds immediately disperse the smoke.

Activation: Fireball Sphere I (4d6).name: Activation: Fireball Sphere I (4d6)
Activation: Fireball Sphere I (4d6).description:
Activate A Interact

Effect You detach a sphere from the necklace, causing it to glow with orange light. After you activate a sphere, if you or anyone else hurls it (an Interact action with the ranged trait), it detonates as a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.sxQZ6yqTn0czJxVd]{Fireball} where it lands. Your toss can place the center of the fireball anywhere within 70 feet, though at the GM's discretion you might need to make an attack roll if the throw is unusually challenging. If no one hurls the sphere by the start of your next turn, it turns into a non-magical red bead.

A roaring blast of fire that explodes in a @Template[type:burst|distance:20] dealing @Damage[4d6[fire]|traits:area-damage] with a @Check[type:reflex|dc:21|basic:true|showDC:all] save.

Note: The listed cooldown is simply the largest refresh I could put, but as noted on the item this does not refreshed. It also lacks the ranged trait (specified by item) and action cost represents the cost to detach and throw this.

Activate A Interact

Effect You detach a sphere from the necklace, causing it to glow with orange light. Your toss can place the center of the fireball anywhere within 70 feet, though at the GM's discretion you might need to make an attack roll if the throw is unusually challenging. If no one hurls the sphere by the start of your next turn, it turns into a non-magical red bead.

A roaring blast of fire that explodes in a @Template[type:burst|distance:20] dealing @Damage[18d6[fire]|traits:area-damage] with a @Check[type:reflex|dc:39|basic:true|showDC:all] save.

Activation: Mystic Enthrallment.name: Activation: Mystic Enthrallment
Activation: Mystic Enthrallment.description:
Activate 2 Interact (emotion, visual)

Frequency once per day

Effect You direct the lantern's light upon a single living creature within 60 feet. That creature must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:20|traits:emotion,visual] save to resist the light's effects.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected and realizes that you attempted to mentally influence them with the light.

Success The creature is unaffected but thinks the light was harmless, unless it knows the true nature of the lantern already.

Failure The creature becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AdPVz7rbaVSRxHFg]{Fascinated} by the lantern's light, and remains fascinated as long as you Sustain the Activation, up to 10 minutes.

Critical Failure As failure, but you can Sustain the Activation for up to 1 hour. When the effect ends, the fascinated creature remembers any events that took place while fascinated only as indistinct, dream-like memories.

Activation: Nhimbaloth Lore.description:

Effect You gain a +2 item bonus to skill checks to Recall Knowledge about Nhimbaloth, her faith, or creatures associated with her (such as incorporeal undead, vampiric mists, wisps, and other incorporeal creatures associated with death).
Activation: Nhimbaloth Lore.gmNote: You are exposed to the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-item-activations.item-activations-effects.Item.AQeYkFzIp2skEyV5]{Empty Death} each time you use this ability.

Activation: Soul Siphon.gmNote: You are exposed to the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-item-activations.item-activations-effects.Item.AQeYkFzIp2skEyV5]{Empty Death} each time you use this ability.

Activation: Soul Speak.description:

The soulspeaker's eyes open, and the next time it's activated, the soulspeaker repeats the message you spoke to it with a rasping whisper before its eyes close again, the message expended.
